main.heading: Description
main.body: Ada Levesmere is a human woman in her mid-forties with long black hair and stern green eyes. She is a capable wizard, though most of her attention goes to politics and the running of Levenmere Hold

main.heading: Family
main.body: The Levesmere family controls Levenmere Hold, the northernmost Hold in the Trehan Empire

main.heading: Description
main.body: Keldyn is an athletic male drow with long white hair and angular features. He wears darkened leathers.

main.heading: Betrayal
main.body: Keldyn lied to the party so they would help him get into the Underdark and meet a companion of his, Esafell Or'Mazrik.
